column3: Body (HTML)

This is our Orange Patchouli Soap, which is heavier on the orange than the patchouli. Made with aloe vera, cocoa butter and it’s 100% natural, vegan, and palm-oil free, our soap bars also leave out all the problems your skin can face with harsh chemicals, preservatives, and detergents.

SCENT

This soap has sweet essential oil from rich oranges and paired with the earthy scent of patchouli, giving it a truly unique and absolutely lovely aroma.

100% Vegan, and All Natural.

 

INGREDIENTS 

Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter, Aloe Vera Liquid, Distilled Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Essential Oil Blend of Orange and Patchouli, Red Brazilian Clay.

SIZE 

these bars weigh about 5 oz in weight

TIPS FOR EXTENDING THE LIFE OF YOUR SOAP

Place your soap in a dish that drains (not flat on the tile or in a non-draining dish!) and ensure that it doesn't get wet between uses. This is optional, but it will definitely make your soap last longer.
column5: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Cosmetics > Bath & Body > Bar Soap

column3:
The BWM Leave-In Hydrating Hair Mist provides an instant daily hydration boost that helps refresh and moisturize strands without weighing your hair down! This hydrating mist helps revive curls, reduce frizz, and enhance overall hair manageability.

Available Size: 8 oz/ 236 ml

 

Who It's For

This product is suitable for anyone looking to hydrate and revitalize their hair.

It's suitable for all hair types including colour-treated hair, natural hair, relaxed hair, dreadlocks. For men, women and children aged 1 and above.

DIRECTIONS

Shake well before use! Spritz directly onto hair and scalp daily from root to tips as often as needed to provide moisture to your locs, braids or natural hair. Gently massage into the scalp or smooth through hair with hands. This product is great for all hair types. It can also be used during your retwist to wet the hair at the roots to prevent breakage when parting.

INGREDIENTS

Aloe Vera, Distilled Water, ProVitamin B-5, Peppermint, Tea Tree, Lavender, Honeyquat, Green Tea Extract, Apple Cider Extract, Poly Suga Mulse, Natural Preservative

CAUTION

  • For external use only.
  • Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse
    thoroughly.
  • Store in a cool, dry place.
  • Use within 12 months of opening.

Products are handmade in small batches using natural and organic ingredients.

Always perform a small patch test to ensure no allergic reaction. Keep away from eyes.

 

No silicons, parabens, phthalates or animal testing

Wildflower Garden soap has a soft floral scent with a hint of honey. This soap bar is the perfect addition to your bath or shower routine. Each bar is handcrafted with butters and oils to leave your skin feeling soft and moisturized.

Wildflower Garden is scented with a blend of organic essential oils: Orange, Clary Sage and Ylang Ylang. The scent is light and refreshing, for those who love and appreciate the beauty of nature. This soap is perfect for gifting to a loved one, or for treating yourself to a little bit of luxury.

Ingredients:

Shea butter, Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Aloe Vera, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Honey, Madder Root, Orange, Clary Sage, Ylang Ylang. 

Size:  5 oz bars

 

HOW TO MAKE YOUR SOAP LAST LONGER

Place your soap on a wooden or any soap dish that drains (not flat on a tile or in a non-draining dish) it will definitely make your soap last longer.
Dark Pine Wooden soap dish that is perfect for our handmade all natural soaps! This allows your soaps to dry completely between uses, extending the life of your soap bar.

This all-in-one shampoo and body bar is men and women. This soap is 100% all natural and palm-oil free. Exfoliate and cleanse with this masculine and rejuvenating mountain man soap. We use coconut milk to give this bar a creamy lather making it a perfect shampoo bar. This bar soap has a unique blend scented with the essential oils of Cedarwood, Fir Needle, Patchouli and Juniper Berry 

INGREDIENT:

Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Cocoa Butter, Castor Oil, Avocado Oil, Distilled Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Coconut Milk, Essential Oil Blend, Honey, Walnut Shell Powder, Cocoa Powder, Honey

Size:  5-6 oz bars

 

HOW TO MAKE YOUR SOAP LAST LONGER

Place your soap on a wooden or any soap dish that drains (not flat on a tile or in a non-draining dish) it will definitely make your soap last longer.

column3:
Our Wild Lavender all-natural whipped body butter is made with just a few ingredients which are Avocado Butter, Mango Butter, Jojoba Oil, Arrowroot Powder and blended Essential Oils. Since this body butter is whipped, it is quite lightweight. 

This body butter is packaged in a 6 oz glass jar with 3.5 oz of butter in each jar. 

Ingredients:

Avocado Butter, Mango Butter, Jojoba Oil, Arrowroot powder, Essential Blends of (Lavender, Fir needle, Patchouli, Juniper berry) smells identical to our soap bar. 

 

 How to use:

Simply put a small amount on your fingers and rub into skin, just as you would with lotion (a little goes a long way) Keep in a cool dark place. If your body butter melts, you can put it in the fridge to harden.  

This body butter does not contain any preservatives, please keep away from water.

Place your soap in a dish that drains (not flat on the tile or in a non-draining dish!) and ensure that it doesn't get wet between uses. This is optional, but it will definitely make your soap last longer.

**This bar is fragrance free to accommodate soap lovers with sensitive skin**

This Oats, Milk and Honey soap has so many wonderful benefits, it’s wonderful for sensitive skin. It provides excellent, gentle exfoliation, is a natural cleanser, soothes itchy, irritated skin and can even help absorb oil for oily skin types. This soap is handmade to pamper your skin with natural goodness. Each bar is infused with wholesome oatmeal, known for its soothing and exfoliating properties, gently buffing away dead skin cells while nourishing your skin with a rich blend of vitamins and minerals. This is perfect for sensitive skin, our oatmeal soap provides a luxurious lather that cleanses without stripping moisture, leaving your skin feeling soft, hydrated, and delicately scented.

Treat yourself to a spa-like experience every day with our oatmeal soap, crafted with care for a truly radiant glow.

 

INGREDIENTS:

Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Goat Milk, Distilled Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Colloidal oatmeal and topped with whole oats 

Size:

• these bars weigh about 5-6 oz in weight

 

TIPS FOR EXTENDING THE LIFE OF YOUR SOAP

Place your soap in a dish that drains (not flat on the tile or in a non-draining dish!) and ensure that it doesn't get wet between uses. This is optional, but it will definitely make your soap last longer.

Ingredients:

Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Distilled Water, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye) Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Aloe,  Cocoa Butter, Avocado Butter, French clay, Spirulina powder, Lime, Rosemary, Spearmint, peppermint, poppyseeds 

5-6 oz Bar

Key Ingredients and a few of its benefits:

Avocado Butter has many benefits for skin, it’s rich in fatty acids which deeply hydrates the skin and makes it soft. It contains antioxidants and vitamins A,D and E which can help reduce the signs of aging like wrinkles and age spots. It can help prevent sun damage and soothe irritated skin from sunburn and shaving. It can help control acne or breakouts.  

Spearmint can relieve skin irritation such as itchiness, insect bites and skin condition such as athlete’s foot. It helps fight acne-causing bacteria. Also can unclog skin and promote its cleansing while leaving your skin feeling cool and refreshed. 

lime kills bacteria and fungus in the skin. It also, tones and tightens the skin

 

HOW TO MAKE YOUR SOAP LAST LONGER

Place your soap on a wooden or any soap dish that drains (not flat on a tile or in a non-draining dish) it will definitely make your soap last longer.

column3:
Wild Lavender is an all-natural, vegan, and palm-oil free soap bar made with coconut milk for an amazingly creamy and gentle lather. This bar is quite exfoliating, due to the sandalwood powder. Leaving your skin feeling smooth, and it smells amazing.

SCENT

Woodsy Lavender 

INGREDIENTS 

Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Organic Cocoa Butter, Coconut Milk, Distilled Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil, Essential Oil Blends of lavender,  fir needle,  patchouli, juniper berry Brazilian Clay, Sandalwood Powder.

SIZE 

5-6 oz

TIPS FOR EXTENDING THE LIFE OF YOUR SOAP

Place your soap in a dish that drains (not flat on the tile or in a non-draining dish. It will definitely make the soap last longer.

Ingredients  

Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Mango Butter, Jojoba Oil, Castor Oil, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Carrot, Turmeric, Lemon

5-6 oz Bar

 

Key Ingredients and it’s Benefit 

Carrots- ( Anti- Inflammatory)The vitamin C in carrots helps keep skin looking youthful and healthy. It gives the skin its elasticity and strength. Carrot can reduce the redness and swelling of rashes and scars 

Turmeric- (Anti- aging) Turmeric can help slow down signs of aging, such as wrinkles, age spots and fine lines. It can also help with dry or textured skin, dark circles and dullness. 

Lemon-  

•Tightens and tones skin, reduces the amount of oil in skin. Leaves complexion looking vibrant, healthy and smooth. 
• Kills bacteria that may get trapped in pores and causes breakouts. It can help to lighten and brighten your skin.  

This bar can be used on face and body. 

HOW TO MAKE YOUR SOAP LAST LONGER

Place your soap on a wooden or any soap dish that drains (not flat on a tile or in a non-draining dish) it will definitely make your soap last longer.

Our Tea Tree Charcoal is known to clear troubled skin. This bar can be used on the face and body. Its healing and cleansing properties has a combination of essential oils that provide antibacterial as well as the healing of acne and other skin conditions. Activated charcoal and bentonite clay are traditionally used for acne-prone skin

 

Ingredients:

Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Sunflower Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Avocado Oil , Castor Oil , Sodium Hydroxide (Lye) , Water, Aloe Vera, Essential blends of Tea Tree, Lavender and Cedarwood, Bentonite, Activated Charcoal.  

Bar 4-5 oz

Treat yourself to our amazing scented Whipped Body Butter and say goodbye to dry, dull skin. Not only will our body butter leave your skin feeling silky smooth, it wipes out dryness to reveal a softness that sticks around. Made with 100% all-natural ingredients. 

INGREDIENTS: Shea butter, Vitis vinifera (Grapeseed) Oil, Jojoba Oil, Cocos nucifera (organic coconut oil), Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (argan oil), Tocopherol (vitamin E) oil, Fragrance Oil, Paraben & Phthalate Free), Mica, Phenoxyethanol, sorbic acid, and capryly! glycol

BENEFIT OF INGREDIENTS USED:

  • Shea Butter - Rejuvenates dry skin and repairs rough skin.
  • Grape-seed Oil - Prevent skin dryness and itching.
  • Jojoba Oil - Promotes healthy-looking skin.
  • Coconut Oil - Provides nutrient-rich hydration as a natural moisturizer for radiant skin.
  • Avocado Oil - Bring about smoother, softer, and more hydrated skin.
  • Argan Oil - Helps to maintain skin's youthfulness.
  • Vitamin E - Stops skin from loosing moisture.

Jar Size 8oz.

SMELL IS AMAZING WILL DEFINITELY TURN HEADS.

Sweet Coco body oil will keep your skin hydrated and nourished through the day without making you greasy. It has a light sweet scent that smells so amazing.

Ingredients: Grapeseed oil, Coconut oil, Almond Oil, jojoba oil, Apricot oil, Avocado oil, coco caprylate, vitamin E and fragrance

Fragrance Note:

amber • coconut • Jasmine

Some of the Benefits:

Almond oil- is a noncomedogenic oil, meaning it won't clog so it's safe to use as an overnight treatment. Almond oil is also a lightweight oil, so it won't feel heavy or greasy on your skin.

Grape seed oil:

  • Tightens Skin
  • Evens Skin Tone
  • Moisturizes
  • Prevent UV Damage

 

Coconut oil:

is also very moisturizing for dry skin.

Jojoba Oil:

Natural moisturiser for your skin, doesn't clog pores.

column3:
BWM EXTRA STRENGTH HAIR GROWTH OIL

Buy 3 and Save $5

BWM Extra Strength Rosemary + Fenugreek Hair Growth

Oil is a blend of 100% all natural oils and herbs. This handmade oil is a little more potent than our original oil.

This will help your hair to grow thicker and longer if consistent. It's great for all hair types for both women and men. BWM Extra Strength is 100% chemical and cruelty free. The herbs are infused for a minimum of 4 weeks before bottled.

Size 4oz/120ml

Ingredients: Almond Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Rosemary, Castor Oil, Avocado Oil, Fenugreek Seeds, Blackseed Oil, Herbal Blend, Rosemary Oil, Vitamin E, Biotin, Peppermint Oil.

For best results, read and follow as directed.

Directions: Shake well before use. Apply a generous amount of oil directly to the scalp and massage in for 1-2 minutes. Use oil 3-5 times per week (or as needed). This oil is for external use only. Please perform a patch test before using.
